version_description:
Version 1.2.1:
- Orange theme is now FREE for all users.
- Rotation bug on iPad on iOS 8 (sorry about that! >.<)
- iPhone 6 / 6+ empty history text alignment

Version 1.2:
- 9 beautiful themes
- Universal for iPhone and iPad (an

Fixes issue with iOS 9 fonts.

Numerical 2 is coming soon ;)

Fixes issue with iOS 9 fonts.

Numerical 2 is coming soon ;)

Welcome to Numerical² - Brand new app, still no equal!
New features include...

- Full scientific keypad including sin/cos/tan, EE, ln, log, square root and more!
- Use the fraction key to do coherent fractional math and your answer is present

Grey Screen Issue:
Thanks to an astute user the cause of the grey screen issue has been determined! It is caused by the way iOS deals with user's who have enabled Reduced Transparency in iOS Settings > Accessibility. A new version will be uploaded s

We are aware of crash on Launch bug that is still affecting some users. Please delete the app and reinstall it while we work on a fix.

We're working hard on a bunch of new features and tweaks suggested by users. If you have anything to add please g

This version restores 2 popular feature requests/demands: a right aligned equation view and swipe to delete function! There are also a lot of minor bug fixes and UI improvements such as improving font sizes and making the equation area bit bigger, thus ma

In this exciting release you can now customise the position of the history list, and disable the scientific keypad - yes, you can make it Numerical 1! There have also been improvements to keyboard responsiveness but more improvements to overall performanc

- Much faster evaluation and keyboard responsiveness.
- Multiline question view, ala Numerical 1.
- Set decimal count option.
- Fix issue where buttons have underline for user who have enabled Display Button Shapes.
- Clear animation.
- Fix

- Themes are now nameable!
- Undo/redo with swipes, up to 30 times.
- Swipe up to clear
- Swipe down to start new with answer
- Fixed bug where e^2 would produce error
- Fixed bug where some equations brought to ^20 or higher would produce
- Bug fixes

Note: There is a bug preventing the Today Widget from working for some users. An update is forthcoming.

- Enable the new Today Widget you can calculate from anywhere! Just swipe down and you can work right there in Notification Center.
- Added c

Update: Fixed issue where "Show More" button would not appear in Today Widget.

- Enable the new Today Widget you can calculate from anywhere! Just swipe down and you can work right there in Notification Center.
- Added copy/paste/insert menu to

Default Themes now change the App's homescreen icon! Custom Themes default to the normal pink/blue icon. This function can be disabled in settings if you prefer the pink/blue icon for all themes.

Also included:
- Fix for issue where some items w

- iOS 11 and iPhone X ready!
- External keyboard support
- Fixed issue where keyboard would erroneously be scrollable
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Minor bug fixes

- iPhone X layout improvements.
- Decimal selector now goes as low as 2 decimal places.
- Fix for issue where editing equations could add unexpected commas and flip fractions.
- Minor bug fixes

• New: Custom Icon Selector - you can now mix and match icon’s and themes, or apply default app icons to your own custom themes (previously, custom theme’s would default to the standard app icon which was not very pleasing)
• Finally: Fixed font spacin

This Version:
• Fixed issue where localised decimal points were, uh, busted.

Minor bug fixes
